title: support getting blame for...??
body: why is that adc always blame support if they are kill..and then blame them some more about cs and ks wdf...and yet they play stupid like they all that..?

replies.body:
it depends, if there is a legitimate oppertunity and you dun goofed, or you were standing there looking at your snapchat.


and then you have the crazzy ass fool, who just goes full ham and gets rekt 24/8
but wot if it was tittayz

The blame game is strong in bronze. had a cho at 1/7 top because he kept going balls deep and got ganked all the time and didnt know how to pull his lane to make it easy for our jg.

The blame is real.
